MoCA has informed the following: -
(i). Digi Yatra provides automated and seamless entry for air passengers at Terminal
Building Entry Doors, Security Entry Gates and Boarding Gates of selected lndian
airports. lt brings efficiency in passenger entry / movement process while enhancing
security standards.
(ii). So far, Digi Yatra has been launched at 13 airports namely Delhi, Bangalore, Varanasi,
Pune, Kolkata, Vijayawada, Hyderabad, Ahmedabad, Mumbai, Kochi, Guwahati, Jaipur
and Lucknow airports. lt is to be launched at airports across country in a phased manner.
Digi Yatra app is available on both Android and IOS plalforms to facilitate the
passengers. As of now, Digi Yatra app has over 30 Lakh downloads and more than 60
lakh passengers have availed the facility of Digi Yatra since its launch.
2.

personnel may be encouraged to download the free Digi Yatra App and enrol.

approved the use of free oigi Yatra App by CISF personnel.
